learningpod.title: Kaplan Kids (Reading): The word well has more than one meaning. Choose the sentence in which well means "in ...

p.b: The word well has more than one meaning.

questionBody.p: Choose the sentence in which well means "in a good way."

simpleChoice.p: "Well," Uncle Bob said, "I suppose you want me to help fix your bike."
The old house had a well out back with good, clean water.
Mara told us that her work training the dogs was going well.
When I watched the movie, tears began to well up in my eyes.
